egi.title: What are EGIs?
egi.subtitle: Digital certificates that combine aesthetic value, immutable {{blockchain}} trace and environmental contribution through {{epp}}.

beyondNft.title: Beyond Traditional NFTs
beyondNft.description: {{egi}}s are not simple NFTs. They are evolved digital assets that bring concrete utility, verifiable certification and measurable real-world environmental impact.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Value
aesthetic.description: Beauty and cultural significance certified on blockchain.

threeComponents.title: The Three Components
threeComponents.description: Each EGI consists of three fundamental elements working in synergy:

epp.title: EPP - Environment Protection Programs
epp.description: Natively integrated verified environmental projects. Each transaction automatically allocates a share to these projects.

goods.title: GOODS - Goods and Services
goods.description: Digital assets representing goods, services, utilities or rights in the real world.

invent.title: INVENT - Innovation
invent.description: The innovative component that makes each EGI unique: {{smartContract}}, dynamic utilities, participatory governance.

epp.title: EPP Environmental Projects
epp.subtitle: How each EGI concretely contributes to environmental sustainability.

intro.title: The Green Heart of FlorenceEGI
intro.description: EPPs represent the platform's concrete commitment to sustainability. Every transaction, every minting, every sale automatically contributes to verified environmental projects.

automatic.title: Automatic Contribution
automatic.description: A percentage of each transaction is automatically allocated to EPPs.

verified.title: Verified Projects
verified.description: Only projects with measurable and verifiable impact are selected.

transparent.title: Traceability
transparent.description: Every contribution is recorded on blockchain for maximum transparency.

florenceEgi.title: The FlorenceEGI Platform
florenceEgi.subtitle: The technical architecture and services that make the Digital Renaissance possible.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: FlorenceEGI is built on Algorand, a {{carbonNegative}} and highly scalable blockchain.

coCreate.title: Co-Creative Ecosystem
coCreate.subtitle: The founding principle of FlorenceEGI: artist, patron and collector grow together.

philosophy.title: The Philosophy
philosophy.description: In FlorenceEGI there is no simple buyer. Whoever owns an EGI becomes a {{coCreator}}, an integral part of the work's story.

artist.title: Artist (Creator)
artist.description: Creates the work, defines royalties, maintains moral rights.

patron.title: Patron
patron.description: Supports the artist, finances creation, becomes co-creator.

collector.title: Collector
collector.description: Guards the work, participates in value, enters history.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Important legal information about using the FlorenceEGI platform.

nature.title: Nature of EGIs
nature.description: EGIs are digital certificates that attest to ownership and authenticity. They are not financial instruments and should not be considered investments.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: FlorenceEGI operates in compliance with {{mica}} regulation and {{gdpr}}.

risks.title: Risk Warnings
risks.description: The value of digital assets can fluctuate. It is recommended to only purchase what you are willing to lose.

whyCannotBuy.title: Why can't I buy?

kyc.title: Identity Verification (KYC)
kyc.description: To purchase, you need to complete identity verification. This is a legal requirement for AML compliance.

wallet.title: Wallet Not Configured
wallet.description: You need to create and configure your {{wallet}} to make transactions.

region.title: Geographic Restrictions
region.description: Some services may not be available in all jurisdictions.
